subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Jordan made strategic advances towards the achievement of Millennium Development Goals, but its achievements are compromised by crippling water scarcity and aggravated by climate change, thus bringing about additional threats to health, food security, productivity, and integrated water management.  This project will help Jordan address the above key strategic issues through achieving strengthened adaptive capacity for health protection and food security to climate change under water scarcity conditions.  This outcome addresses identified barriers to adaptation and provides support to Jordan’s priorities of sustainable management of its water resources.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Adaptation to CC - MDG F
